resources.string: Warning: remove admin permissions shout down screen off application.
Make this application a device administrator to turn off screen when you want with a single tap.

Thank you for downloading Screen Off.
To enable the service grant application administrator privileges.
Finally use the shortcut to turn off the screen with a single tap.

For any feedback or request uses the community accessible via the icon in the upper right corner.
Add a shortcut to your home or to any third party application to turn off the screen quickly with just one tap.
Are you sure you want to remove administrator privileges?
Click here to turn off screen
